lead_paragraph: The No. 2 official in the Tulsa County sheriff’s office resigned Monday amid accusations that he quashed criticisms of a volunteer deputy who later killed a restrained man.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Undersheriff Quits in Tulsa County
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Undersheriff Quits In Tulsa County

snippet: The No. 2 official in the Tulsa County sheriff’s office resigned Monday amid accusations that he quashed criticisms of a volunteer deputy who later killed a restrained man.
